It tastes very sour but I think its just because of the lemon flavor however it works but made me feel nausea and cramps a few minutes after and bloated as I am typing this. I still have side effects and this is after drinking it and this is 10 or 9 hours later it works good but I felt a lot of pressure so I took two Tylenol pills before going and worked it smoothly.”

“Okay so I’ve been constipated for about 12 days. 3 trips to the ER and this last one they gave me this lemony drink and they didn’t tell me anything about what it was gonna do to me. I get home at 3 am, fall asleep, wake up at 8 for work. I go to work and realize I made a mistake! It gets to 12 and I’m rushing home going about 100 on the freeway. Now me and my toilet have practically gotten married at this point. That was almost 24 hours ago and I still am having a really poopy time. It’s slowed down significantly considering I was on the toilet every 5 minutes. Now it’s just a little and my bum is sore as anythoing. USE WIPES AND GET OINTMENT OR PETROLEUM JELLY FOR YOUR BOOTY.”

“I was constipated for a little over a week. I took milk of magnesia and miralax but neither worked. So I did an oil enema and that too did not work. Eventually my moms coworker told me to take magnesium citrate so I go to Publix and get their lemon one. I read reviews before taking it to see what I was getting myself into. I took 1/2 of the bottle and the taste was bad but bearable. I was expecting something to happen within a few hours but all that happened was extreme nausea. The next morning I woke up with the urge to go so I go to the bathroom and I basically peed out of my anus. That happened 3/4 times within an hour but after that it stopped. I could tell I was still backed up so we did another enema, this time a saline one. The second I pulled out the nozzle I ran to the toilet and oh my .. the relief is insane. I recommend this product and if you want instant relief use an enema with it as well”

“I was taking this as my first step for colonoscopy.  As instructed by Dr eat light meal which was large bowl of light soup. I drank whole bottle, nothing happened for 11 hours, was getting painful cramps, Sat on toilet and forced and forced and finally got about 1 second of diarrhea. Very painful, still have poop inside of me. I have colonoscopy in 26 hours. I am diabetic on insulin. I hope the colonoscopy prep works later when I drink it. Took off work 2 days.”

“Ahhhhhhhh, is all I have to say. 

Feeling light as a feather after being weighed down for weeks!”

“I have chronic constipation and this is the only laxative that works for me. I had to go to the ER for the second time in a few years due to not having a good BM in a few weeks.
They recommended the magnesium citrate again for the second time around and if you are chronically constipated IT WILL TAKE A WHILE so make sure you have the next couple days off.
This last time, I took a whole bottle (10 fl oz) around 8pm at night. I woke up the next morning feeling nothing so I took another half bottle (5 fl oz) and then within the next 2 or 3 hours the rumbling and flooding started and lasted the whole day. Make sure you have baby wipes so your bottom doesn’t go too raw and apply ointment before it all starts and during the event as well.
It is 1am Saturday morning and I am having bloating, nausea and a terrible stomach ache. I knew I was going to have diarrhea, but I didn’t know how gross I would feel the next night, and I’m back to going to the bathroom.
VERY effective for people like me but nasty side effects.”

“My sister-in-law said to try this after I've not had a bowel  movement in over a week. That is with the help of laxatives.  She said within an hour,  she was able to poop. 
After an hour,   I kept feeling more and more nauseated and ended up throwing it up along with any other fluids.  I'm going camping in the morning.  This past few hours has been miserable. 


I finally went back to the store and got and enema.  At least there's some relief,  and I'm not nauseated. 

I'm hoping what did get into the system doesn't have me pooping anytime within the  5+ hours to get to my destination.  
Do I recommend... Absolutely  not!!! It seems like I had this year's ago,  and it had the same effect.  
Save yourself, and your stomach, the agony.”
“I took 3 dulcolax and a whole bottle of citrate at 1:30 it is 11.21 I am raw and it's painful but it worked, I am preparing for an xray”

“Okay.  So I felt discouraged about this because I've been reading reviews where everyone had a successful bowel movement so quickly.   I have been backed up for 3 weeks. I feel like it's from stress and life changes.  My routine was different.  I have tried 2 enemas and I was only able to get small rabbit sized poop.  I actually couldn't take it anymore and went to the ER.  Wish I didn't because they didn't do anything but tell me to drink the magnesium citrate and do another enema. Enema wasn't too successful. I tried magnesium citrate at 8am. Chugged the whole thing.  Drank water.  I waited and nothing. I felt so disappointed and felt miserable that I was going to have this stuck feeling with no result!  16 hours later came.  Gurgling and pain.  I went to the bathroom and released two massive pieces I've ever pushed out ever.  Sorry TMI but I guess that's what's been backed up!!!  So if you think it's not working. I guess I'd wait 24 hours. I feel so relieved now!”

“I personally had a bad experience. Bad constipation was my symptom, like everyone else. Super bloated and backed up. Instructed to take an entire bottle  of this. 6 hours later, I’m full of regret and wish I was constipated again. I have lost everything inside me in very painful episodes of diarrhea (10 episodes and counting) I’m extremely weak and I can’t chug water fast enough to keep me hydrated. This stuff is dangerous. If a doc tells you to take a bottle TRUST ME take half. Be nice to your tummy :)”
“Severe constipation. ER Dr. told me to take this magnesium citrate. Nothing. sigh...”

“Last poop: 3+ weeks ago
Starting weight: 155lbs
6:05PM drank entire bottle Cherry flavor followed by lots of water
6:09PM burp
6:30PM One poop. Long and soft.
Lots of farting into the evening.
8:08AM (14 hours later) Straining trying to poop. 2 tiny soft poops release.
Drank coffee
8:35AM first watery poop... and we are off”

“magnesium citrate works every time for severe constipation. This time I got the cherry flavor and chugged it (10oz) along with sixteen ounces of water. Started working within two hours and still going :~)”

“How long does magnesium citrate take to work you may ask. Well it took me up until about 12 hours after taking a whole bottle, this just so happened to be an hour before I had to be at the hospital for a procedure - not convenient at all!”

Citrate of Magnesia (magnesium citrate):			“I drank magnesia citrate, it was a half bottle and I chased it with warm water and it worked, within thirty minutes I was on the toilet. It is very good. 
 My stomach is rumbling as I type lol. If you try the product make sure you drank with warm water.”

“I haven't had a bowel motion (BM) in 12 days. Grabbed a 10oz bottle of grape flavored magnesium citrate from the store this morning and downed it at 9:37 a.m. I took it on an empty stomach and honestly haven't eaten anything today. I've been drinking plenty of water also.  It's 4:02 p.m. and nothing has happened. Zip, Zilch, Nada! What I've read says I should have had a BM by the time I got to 6 hours and I'm pushing 6.5 at this point.”

Citrate of Magnesia (magnesium citrate):			“I started my day off in a terrible mood. My stomach was aching, I couldn’t sleep and my belly was distended. After speaking to a friend he advised me about this product. I quickly ran to my 1987 mustang with the top off and rushed to the local pharmacy. With pain in my eyes I found the product I was searching for. I bought the root beer flavor because it’s da best. I opened it before paying and with one gulp it was gone. I don’t recommend drinking this hot but I needed it. I took the empty bottle up to the counter and paid for it. Reasonably priced I might add. I stepped back in to my hot rod and drove off. Unfortunately I took the scenic route. Nothing in sight other than trees.  I began to feel a strange sensation in my gut. I took it as a playful fart and kept driving. A warm feeling quickly surrounded my cheeks. I pulled over as fast as I could and ran to the nearest tree. ...I would not recommend this unless you are at home.”
“Drank the magnesium citrate at 6pm. It's 10:30 now. Still nothing. Did yoga, massaged my belly. Nothing. Hope I can sleep, but wouldn't mind waking up for relief. Help!!”

“Y’all. I took magnesium citrate  20 hours ago and still nothing. I drank the whole bottle along with 8oz (now way more) of water. I thought I could feel it working while I was drinking it, but I haven’t even had the urge to go yet. I’ve sat on the toilet hoping for some movement, but nothing. I have a party to go to in a couple of hours but based on the other reviews I’m a bit nervous to leave the house. Wish me luck.”

“So like most of you I am sitting on the toilet writing this.  This is my first trip to the toilet after drinking this stuff . The ER Dr. Prescribed it to me after going in today with horrible lower stomach pains and after many test determined I was full of poop, nothing else did the trick, but this did”

“I regularly get constipated when I travel.  On a recent trip I got constipated again.  I took bisacodyl tablets then later used gylcerin suppositories.  Nothing worked, so I called advice nurse who told me to take MC  (magnesium citrate) when I got home if other stuff did not kick in.  I drank one 8 oz bottle of MC at 4 p.m. and by 10 p.m. it was working.   Had to go hourly until 6 a.m.  MC is definitely more powerful than other laxatives and is recommended when the usual other milder products do not work.”

“For maximum effect, take a smaller dose (4-6 oz) on an empty stomach if you can tolerate it.  I suspect the people for which this has not worked, or worked slowly, are taking it with food, so it takes so much longer to get where is needs to be, so that it can do its work.
”

“Picked up a 10oz bottle of magnesium citrate for around $2. Drank about 4oz and stopped because of the awful taste. Took a break and downed 16oz of water and then about 4-6oz of the mag.citrate. I took the #2 train to Browntown about 2 hours later. Works great, tastes horrible.”

“Been having a lot of gut problems over the last couple years to where I have slowly changed my diet. Constipation recently became part if the problem. Wasn't totally blocked but my abdomen was staying swellen and 
 I had lower back pain. Daughter suggested the MAgnesiun Citrate...well no doubt within 30 to 45 mins it worked. Waiting to see if that relieves some of the other problems.”
“Magnesium citrate works for my constipation every time, with minimal side effects”

“I suffer from IBS but I vary between long periods of constipation and diarrhea. Well I’ve been constipated for about 10 days when I heard of this stuff and gave it a shot. I drank the minimum 6 oz and a big bottle of water. It made me really nauseous while drinking it but didn’t make me sick. I took it at 5:30 pm it took until about 7:30pm to work and it’s been a liquid waterfall ever since. It’s currently 2:30 am and still on toilet no end in sight! I would recommend taking in the morning so you don’t miss out on sleep. Also, my stomach gurgles so loud with it in between bouts of poop”

“Well I just down to the bottle and we will see how it turns out. Going off of everyone's reviews I think I should be feeling good within the next 3 to 6 hours hopefully! Have been extremely backed up for a good week and I'm ready for the relief. FYI it didn't taste so bad I got the lemon flavor ”

“Used this cause I ended up being constipated for 5+ days, even tho I was able to pass a tiny bit on my own I ended up drinking the whole bottle cause I wasn't 100% sure how clogged up I was still. It took no longer than 3 hours for it to start working, first it was mostly hard poops that were coming out, and that gradually became liquid/gooey poops, as I am typing this I am still running back and forth going to the bathroom. Please be careful and consider only drink half a dose of this if its only slight constipation!”
“It helped.”

“I hadn’t gone for about 7 days. Tried Miralax, suppositories, and an enema, but those didn’t do anything. Finally, my doctor told me to get this. I drank 3/4 of the bottle along with 8 oz of water. It took about 8 hrs before anything happened. I didn’t have diarrhea like others, but I did have a couple of initial BMs that were soft. My stomach has been gurgling off and on since the initial BMs and I’ve used the bathroom a few more times, but it hasn’t been bad. Just happy to get some relief.”

“This works, could not go #2 for 4 days and lots of pain, bought the cherry kind from shoppers drugmart and drank half the bottle as per the pharmacist and 6 hours later it worked.  I feel a whole lot better now as I sit here on the throne writing this!!  I totally recommend this product 1000%”

“I had no idea what this stuff was but was directed to take it because I had fecal impaction, that along with 10 mg of dulcolax. I didn't do any research before and did exactly what my dr. told me. I drank a whole 10oz bottle of MC. Within 15 minutes I had a bowel movement of pure water, then another, and another. One of my bowel movements actually had solids in it, which presumably were some of the impacted stool. I must have had 7 bowel movements in 1 1/2 hour, and still having them at the time of writing this. I actually drank a gatorade and the color of the gatorade was what my water looked like in the next few bowel movements. I honestly started to get anxious and thought about going to the hospital. Instead I called the clinic of the dr. who prescribed this to me and they laughed and said I was ok and just to drink enough liquids. That's where I'm at right now.”

“Well I read many reviews here before I took the MC. Lots made me laugh but y'all gave me a concern. As we were travelling I did not want to be in an explosive situation however I was pretty desperate for relief. So at 7pm I drank 1/3 of a bottle of CVS lemon. And it is NASTY: syrupy tart and difficult to get down. Drank about 10 ounces of water and waited.  A few belly rumbles but nothing. So at 9pm I took a bit more- drank down to the 1/2 way point. And more water. At 10 pm the urge hit and I managed to pass 2 extremely painfully huge bulky stools. What I think happened is the smaller amount I drank started to work higher up in my colon but did not get a chance to penetrate things further down. Not pleasant but it got the job done. The upside is I was able to travel the next day without incident. 1/2 a bottle worked for me with lots of water - thanks. Try to be patient and take as little of this as possible. I cannot imagine how people survive taking multiple bottles!”

“My advice, do not use the whole bottle! Start with half and wait a couple hours to see what happens.  I made bathroom trips for almost 24 hours and it also increased urination. I became extremely dehydrated even after drinking Pedialyte and water the entire time. This medicine does it's job but it's not a good experience and hard on the system. I would use it as a last resort.”

“This is a review that applies to my brother.  He has stage four bladder cancer.  They gave him this stuff while hospitalized.  His bladder had been pressing against his colon because of the cancer.  They removed his bladder amongst other things.  Then the next day after this surgery they gave him this stuff.  It is a very strong laxative I know I have used it.  He wound up tearing a hole in his colon which in turn unleashed an attack of infection that they are still trying to control.  This stuff is great in this case it almost borders on malpractice given the fact that they knew how thin the wall of his colon had become.  I would recommend using only after pretty much everything else has failed.”

“I took two bottles of this because I was very stopped up. One at 4pm and one at 8pm per doctors orders. It does the job but so harsh. I literally had to have my husband go out and buy me diapers, I literally cannot make it to the toilet when the urge hits. It is uncontrollable. It is complete liquid- coming out like a fire hose every time. I’m writing this review from the potty- where I’ll be all night. Sorry if this is TMI, but users beware!”

“I was constipated for several days due to traveling and eating like a garbage. I tried the cherry flavor. I only drank 1/4 of the bottle and diluted it with water. Started working within 2 hours. I had some nausea but I took some Zofran to take care of that. I was able to have multiple bowel movements without diarrhea. 10/10.”

“After a trip to the ER, days of different laxatives, suppositories, the whole works, I finally picked up this magical bottle. I had been constipated for almost a week and was pretty much willing to try anything. I read a lot of reviews saying this stuff works within minutes to an hour. I drank the whole bottle at 3pm and I felt my stomach churning with mild cramping but still no bowel movement. Hours later, still nothing. I was convinced I was going to take another trip back to the ER. After 8 hours I finally had my first bowel motion and from there on out my intestines just cleared out. So thankful for this medicine. Give it at least 24 hours to work, chances are it will.”

“I have been traveling nonstop for a few weeks and not eating so great. When I arrived back home, I could tell my body needed a little help moving things around. I bought the stuff at the drug store and drank the whole bottle in about 5 minutes. It doesn’t taste great. It made me feel a little nauseous but nothing too crazy. About an hour after drinking it, I started to feel some really strong gurgles. A tip for anyone who is going to take this- when you feel the urge to go, RUN! I have gone at least 7 times in the last hour, and it’s completely liquid (sorry TMI). It literally liquifies your insides. I see no end in sight. It’s harsh but it does that job!”

“It’s good and makes u feel better. Don’t leave your house and don't take it if hyour not in your own home. Drink a lot of water when you take it and exercise or walk a lot it will hit u faster and better . I’ve been eating healthy and I got to the gym everyday still get constipated I don’t know why ??”

“I  have taken MC years ago after vomiting the cleanser given prior to colonoscopy. Omg, this was the best. Talk about a cleanse, wow! I remember cramping but felt sooo much better afterwards. You must be near a bathroom, it worked pretty quick for me. It was an all night thing but again, Worth every minute on the toilet. So much relief!
Yesterday, I spent all day in the ER due to severe sharp pains on my lower right side. I was thinking appendix. ER took 2 CT’s, one without contrast, one with contrast . It showed my blocked bowels. They sent me home with nothing except diet suggestions. Duh.

I’ve been in bed still with this pain. Tomorrow first thing in AM, I’m taking MC. Hoping for relief again.”

“THANKFUL For  the making  magnesium citrate! And for all you on this unique site!  I  was soo afraid this rock hard mass would tear me apart trying to get out, or that MC wouldn't work. I drink super shakes to avoid constipation,  but 2 wks.after surgery and not wanting veggies I was a week impacted. After frantically searching,  I read this site and drank half a bottle of lemon lime MC mixed with a glass of grape Power-drink, sugar free. Just like grape soda. Drank whole water bottle after 20 min. Plus 2 big cups hot H2Owith  fresh lemon (and sugar!)
In three hours, overwhelming urge  had me in tears as mass tried to exit. Went back to couch.
An hour later,  rush to john, sat there in terrible impacted pain, then this large hard mass suddenly softened enough to push out followed easily by the rest of contents which were fine. Didn't take full bottle, 1/2 gave relief.”

“So I have been dealing with constipation for 3 days drank a whole bottle of this stuff and 30 minutes later uncontrollable bursts of liquid for another 2 hours and also a slight head ache maybe caused by the amount of water it  takes out of your body. While drinking it the nausea was crazy but it got job done. I do recommend this product P.S still sitting on the toilet ”

“So I have been dealing with constipation for 3 days drank a whole bottle of this stuff and 30 minutes later uncontrollable bursts of liquid for another 2 hours and also a slight head ache maybe caused by the amount of water it takes out of your body and while drinking it nausea was crazy but it got job done. I do recommend this product P.S still sitting on the toilet XD”

“I have struggled with IBS-C for 16 years. You name it I’ve tried it. Probiotics, magnesium supplements, fish oil, B Complex, Mira lax, enemas, and stool softeners. This product worked but I was so severely backed up for 4 1/2 days due to stress and taking Ativan that it caused extreme cramping, profuse sweating, gurgling, and such extreme bloating I looked 6 months pregnant and it was extremely painful. Several times I considered going to the ER but I stuck it out. It took 11 hours to kick in and work for me and my digestive tract. It was completely miserable and I really only recommend it in dire straits situations. I am hoping to get back on track and not have to use this product again for a very long time.”

“This stuff is like your daily metabolism. If you eat rice daily. You will most likely have slow digestion, my stomach is asian. So most reviews say about 3+ hours, my was 12 hours and ran to the toilet. My stomach was rumbling various moments during the night, before and after sleep. I woke up with a mild cramp. Hours later, the Magnesium Citrate had created water and feces...bits of poop. Eat one meal that is chewed or even yogurt. I would not eat any other foods. Drink water for the other part of the day. [I drank 1 MC lemon bottle with juice]”

“Little nervous. Drank the bottle had 3 or more full glasses of water.  I started a little then it completely stopped.  Hope it works.  I feel a little sick to my tummy. Even drank warm chicken broth hoping something warm would get things moving.  What happens if it does not work. It is a Sunday and Drs offices are closed ? Any suggestions?”

“I took MC for constipation after miralax and Milk of Magnesium didn’t work for me. I got home and took 6 oz with water and 3 stool softeners. Needless to say I was going within 5 minutes after taking the MC and stool softeners. It was an easy process. Nothing hurt to come out but I did get diarrhea. I took a shower then ate some grapes which was my mistake. Because my body was still dealing with the MC. I ended up vomiting. Which is also a side effect of the drug. All in all I would recommend if you have hard time finding relief and want it quickly like I did after not going for 5 days.”

“I have to take this for an upcoming surgery. Nurse told me to take it 18 hours before for my surgery because "it can take some time to work." SO, I thought hmmmm, I'm feeling bloated and backed up, I better do it two nights in a row instead of just the day before. I drank 2/3 of the bottle with plenty of water. Within 20 min I had gurgling and an urge to go. Within 30 min it was more than an urge. More like an exciting, intense fear. A game almost, Will I make it?? You have about 3 seconds to play that game. I lost count at how many times I went but it was around 15 times in just a couple hours. Each time thinking, this must be it. There can't possibly be anything left in me. Nope, 5 min later, here comes something you ate 2 months ago....The best part is since I thought I knew more than the nurse, I get to do it all over tonight! Yay! (eye roll) But I am loving this hollow feeling in my body. Complete and total clean out!”
“Let me tell you... it took only 50 min for this to work on me!”

“My advice: Do NOT take the whole 10 oz. bottle at once. This laxative is very effective but very powerful. I drank 6 oz. of the 10 oz. CVS lemon-flavored solution, and then drank plenty of water. Two hours later, I had both sudden nausea and an urge to go to the bathroom.

The Magnesium Citrate worked great at relieving the constipation. But the nausea was bad -- I'm lucky I didn't vomit. I can't imagine taking a whole bottle at once. Take the lowest dose listed on the label; then take more if you don't get results in six hours.”

“My reaction is a bit more measured than others. It does work and worked when other laxatives like Miralax and stool softener capsules did not. In fact they did nothing.

It took about 3 1/2 hours to kick in. Nothing out of control or explosive but it did the job when others didn't. At about 3 bucks for a bottle, a good cheap way to get things moving.”

“It didn't help with constipation even at high doses, but worse than that caused extreme panic attacks that lasted for days, and depression too. Thinking it dulled the effects of my anti anxiety and anti depressant medicine. It's the only different thing I've been doing.”

“Though the taste is horrid and it does supply some side effects (stomach gurgling, mild cramping) this stuff WORKS. Though the bottle says half hour to 6 hours give it a full 24 hours before you discredit it, for me it took around 10 hours. It may not feel like it's going to work but the urge will come fairly abruptly. You'll need a day off of work, a lot of toilet paper, water, and your phone or some reading material at the ready!”

“Like others, I’m writing this from the toilet. Be prepared, it is going to be a waterfall. It’s 2am and I see no end in sight. I’d honestly suggest wearing a diaper if you want to try and sleep between each time you sprint to the bathroom.”

“I went to the ER two nights ago, with severe pain and pressure. After an x-ray, blood work and a CT scan, I was found to have a leaking ovarian cyst and on a side note, the CT showed a seriously full colon which was actually contributing to my pain. I'm 5'7" and 120lbs so bloat is OBVIOUS! Co-workers were looking at me funny I mean I looked 7 months pregnant. Seriously. I was bloated for close to a month.  My ER PA suggested this stuff. He handed me a bottle and said drink half the bottle. If that doesn't work, drink the other half. This stuff worked like a charm!!! I've got some serious lower back pain all of the sudden though, but I'm assuming that's from the leaking cyst and as I said I have other concerns.  I don't care! I FINALLY POOPED!!!! I mean it was amazing. It started slow...but then bursts of pure liquid. Best feeling ever!!!”

“Okay...so I was in the hospital for parasites about a month ago and ever since then I have only had BMs if I take something. And even then it's still difficult. My mom recommended this stuff to me. I drank about 3/4 of the 10oz bottle at 3:30pm and I started exploding at 5pm. If you need to go, it works. Only downsides I experienced are pretty bad nausea and cramping (comes and goes between movements) and the fact it's not an instant one and done relief...don't take this if you have plans and can help it. I'm gonna have a hard  time at work in the morning...”

“Been on pain meds for four months. Found out my stool was impacted. Took stool softeners and laxatives, no results. Drank one full 100 ml bottle of the grape flavor and oh buddy the insides got to rolling. If possible just stay on the toilet. I repeat stay on the toilet. Still going 4.5 hours later but much less violently and not much cramping.”

“I mixed the cherry flavor with Gatorade fruit punch over ice.  50/50.  I don't know how you guys are drinking this straight. But I'm not good with sour, the Gatorade made it a lot easier to get down.”

“I took it because since I came out of the hospital(August 14th) I've been constipated. I tried several different things and nothing worked. My dad said try this stuff cause it always works for him within 30 min. Well it didn't work so I went to bed with a diaper on just in case. I figured I'd buy another bottle of it tomorrow. About 24 hours later it worked.”

“This product works great! Recent bouts of IBS (irritable bowel syndrome - constipation) has sent me to the ER now twice. No bowel movement for 7 days, drank prune juice, took lax, 2 enemas, stool softeners, nothing worked! After ER trip, doctor recommended this miracle drink & sent me home! You will need the next 12+ hours off. I drank the lemon flavor & didn't find the taste that bad BUT it made me super nauseous for an hour after drinking it. Took about 8 hours to kick in, tummy gurgles & the next morning, everything has come out in liquid grossness & I have a feeling it will continue all day! I was worried this wasn't going to work after a few hours and no results but other reviewers have had different timelines of how quick this takes to kick in. When all else fails, this product does what it needs to do! Will save me a lot of time and money on any future ER visits! $3 a bottle and issue fixed...for now! Wish I found this product sooner!!!”

“I definitely recommend this product when you're seriously backed up. Or if you suffer from IBD (irritable bowel disease) with constipation like I do. You know that drill. One to two weeks of constipation and then straight up diarrhea... Anyway this is the second time I've used it. Taste is pretty nasty but it gets it done. You're in for some serious power hosing on your toilet. Make sure you stay near a bathroom after taking it. First time I took it my bedsheets ended up as a casualty. Be warned. Its liquid dynamite lol”

“Today  is day 16 without a bowel motion (BM).  On day seven I went to the doctor and had blood work up  (all fine) and was put on magnesium tablets and mirlax with no result. Back to dr day 14 got CT scan ( showed no blockage) now today, day 16 dr gave me a 10 oz bottle of cherry calcitrait. It’s been five hours and still  no results.  As far as my dr is concerned I’m ok...”

“Constipated for 4 days and tried bisacodyl (5 mg followed by 10 mg next day) then glycerin suppositories with no effect, then tried MC at 4 p.m. yesterday (lemon effervescent) followed by continuous 3 oz. sips of water.  5 hrs later I started to hear faint stomach noises that became more noticeable in the next hour.   Then at 10 p.m, I had slight watery toilet output, nothing urgent or explosive.  Every hour through the night to 6 a.m. I had more watery toilet output, forceful but not explosive, replenishing water with small sips.  Today I feel great and relieved that I found something that worked.  Hooray for magnesium citrate.”

“My doctor said she thinks I may be constipated, so she recommended I drink a bottle of MC (10oz). I took this around 11:30AM. I started having bowel movements around 2:40PM. The bowel movements were off and on about every thirty minutes or less until around 6PM. Then they happened every hour or more. I had awful rectal burning and bleeding from using the bathroom so much. This stuff cleared me out, but my bloating and stomach pain are still there.”
“Worked like a charm”

“I drank a whole bottle at around 2pm after realizing that I haven’t been having a regular bowel movements since moving to Hawaii a month ago. After about 5 hours I began to have a nauseated feeling and some cramping and right after I experienced the first round of the meds working. It’s now 10:34 pm and I’m on my 4th run to the bathroom. I recommend taking this early in the morning so you’re not up all night. But it definitely works !”

“I have had some very hard stools the past few days and I've been really uncomfortable. I got some MC this morning at Walmart for 98 cents after reading these reviews. I was scared to try it because so many people have said it tastes disgusting. Well luckily for me I'm a huge fan of sour stuff it literally taste like carbonated sour juice . tastes great to me ;) . I noticed my stomach started bubbling and I had to go , I'm still waiting for more results but so far so good”

“I had a Urolift procedure 10 days ago. Somehow got a UTI. The doctor prescribed the antibiotic Bactrim. Started taking it I noticed I could not go to the bathroom.   The "clog" felt like it was high up the colon and just would not budge. Due to the surgery straining was out. I tried glycerin suppositories, Fleet Enema, Miralax, eating prunes, bran cereal and taking two Citrucel's to build up the fiber. Nothing worked. Researching I found MC and read the reviews. The more I read the more I wanted to try this product. So I bought a bottle of the cherry flavored. It was ok. I mean I have taken worse medications. I drank a 50 ounces of water and continued to drink water the rest of the day. I can see how you could get dehydrated if you don't.  Within 5 minutes it started doing its job. The clog was the first to go. Make sure you are around the house the  entire day.  It feels like I have lost 5lbs and my bloating etc is no more. I will definitely use this product again if I need to.”

“I haven’t had a BM for almost a week. The past two days were the worst.  I felt bloated, nauseous and uncomfortable with abdominal pain. Nothing, including two enemas helped until magnesium citrate. Things began to “flow” about an hour after I drank an entire bottle. I’m not going to lie this stuff isn’t for the faint of heart! It’s tough going down and even more tough going out! But it cures my constipation which I desperately needed.”

“I am writing this review right after I finished passing my constipation. This product works great I was clogged up for about three days. 

If you think this product will relieve you of all your pain then you are sorely mistaken. It merely softens the stool helping you to relieve it. It's like the robin to your butt, it's a lot of help but it's still just a sidekick to your batman.

The only reason I didn't give this a full ten was because instead of just drinking one and being over with it I needed two full bottles of this.

Overall a fine product but it tastes s terrible, nauseatingly terrible.

I'll start eating better and exercising more, pizza and Internet are not worth this kind of pain.”

“Six days post op and needed this badly. It did the trick. I know each case is different but I took it about 9pm last night and it started working around 2am this morning. Some cramping but very welcome feeling. I had a surgery where straining to go was not an option and this worked well.”

“I decided to write this because I have nothing better to do while I’m scared to leave the toilet. I’ve been feeling bloated and bunged up for a couple weeks and thought I’d give this a try to reboot my poop-shoot. I woke up at 630am and started drinking 1000ml of water, at 10am I choked down my cherry flavour citro-mag followed by more water. For about 30 minutes I was really nauseous but I don’t know if it’s from the meds or the copious amounts of water I drank. It’s now 1210 and this stuff has liquified my insides. There’s no leaving this porcelain throne but at least it seems to be doing its job! Also not really any cramping but my stomach feels really bubbly, I imagine this is what the inside of a can of pop feels like.”

“Magnesium Citrate it doesn’t sound so bad but  are you in for a surprise. Of course when you’re constipated you’d want the quickest and most efficient method of getting things going. Well, if you’ve taken a swig or even a full on sip prepare yourself for a day of squatting and pain. Literally, the stuff liquifies everything in your stomach and digestion track to help the bowels pass but in a rather extreme way. It could be very violent on the wrong person, but on others it can be very gentle. Also, it does have side effects. Loss of appetite, nausea, and prolonged purging. So please be weary when purchasing this awfully strong laxative. It’s for your best interest as no one 
had mine.”

“I've had to take antibiotics for my wisdom teeth and didn't have bowel motion for 5 days. My stomach was so bloated, my butt was hurting from pushing and nothing coming out. It was hurting so much that I couldn't sit down. Took half the bottle and drank 40oz of water. It worked 2 hours after me taking my last 30ml of the product. I took it 30ml at a time every half hour with lots of water, hoping it will relief me and I would have drunk half the bottle. The taste was horrid. The stool that was stuck was a hard lump, I had to push again and it hurt but it was passing at a normal-ish rate. And then it was a river of poop. What a relief.”
“Mud City. Mudagra Falls. Goin down to mud town! Cherry flavor was sour but took me down the Muddissippi River.”

“I am taking this as prep for a colonoscopy because of my chronic constipation. Took at 5pm, full bottle and 16 oz of water. Stomach started bubbling almost immediately. 2 hours later things slowly started to move. At the 3 hour mark I was going a little bit, 1 good water squirt ever 10 -15 mins. No cramping or anything. Went to bed at 9pm. Woke up at 2:30am and let's just say the rest of the morning included a lot of bleach, a washing machine and a shower - you get the picture! 12 hours into this and my stomach is still bubbling but not much else. The fun part is tonight I still have to do the suprep and then again in the morning.  The prep for a colonoscopy is no joke! Lord help me.”

“I have used this  successfully on 3 separate occasions after getting constipated when taking pain medication. Just make sure to drink plenty of fluids before and after. This last time I was poopless for 4 days. I drank half a bottle of berry flavored MC 3 hours ago and voila! No more constipation. I didn't have any cramping and only mildly gassy. You'll know when it's coming, you'll  feel the heat approaching your butt and before you know it your have been cleared. Good luck!”

“I went to the Dr, he talked about hernia but focused on me taking this to pass my stools. It worked after 14 hrs, lasted max 20 mins. Lying on my couch waiting for the sharp pains to subside in my back and side. No nausea just sharp pain. I recommend this product if you want to clean yourself out.”

“I was constipated for like 3 weeks and as soon as I took this I went. I had the cherry flavoured one and I poured it in a cup in put about 5 ice cubes in it. The cherry one is not bad at all it is very sour tho but I ate a strawberry popsicle on the side while I drunk it. It worked in like 10minutes honestly...If you want great results you have to drink the whole bottle.”
“Goodness this worked! Plug came out first but it hasn't even started..oh boy it's gonna be a long day. Cleared schedule and stocked up on super soft toilet paper. No more cheese for me.”

“I first heard about Magnesium Citrate from my Dr after 5 days without a BM. I went to urgent care and got an xray to find that I had hard stool. She gave me a bottle and it worked after 1.5 hours. It made me a bit nauseous and lasted about 6 hours after the initial dose. This last time around I'd been stopped up about 3 days. I took the full 10 oz bottle and it started working in 45 mins. This time however I've had a lot of cramping and abdominal pain. I'm not sure if its because I haven't been properly hydrated or a more serious problem. I've been steadily drinking water since and its been 2.5 hours since I drank the bottle. Hopefully the cramps subside soon.”

“I have been stopped up for 5 days, drank some of this and went to the bathroom almost immediately. I tried everything else before this, my doctor told me about it but you can get it at your local pharmacy for 3$”

“I am usually pretty regular, but after taking Vicodin for dental surgery pain, I was stopped up for 7 days. I Googles laxatives, and MC came up. I picked up two bottles at CVS, the Cherry and Lemon Lime flavors, and drank the entire cherry  bottle at about 5pm when I got home, followed by a lot of water. I did feel nauseous for about an hour after drinking it, but thankfully it passed. When I had no results, I decided to drink a mint tea and go to bed.
 I awoke at 4am to go pee - no other urges, and while in the bathroom, I'm like, well let's try pooing, and sure enough without any trumpets or fanfare, a nice solid bowel motion came out. I wiped, thought - wow, that was it? Nope! 5 mins later, I had to go again, this was "sludgey" followed by a river gushing out of my butt. No pain, no discomfort, just evacuation, then nothing. I literally lost 3lbs in 5 mins. I seem to have no other urges, so if that was it, it was perfection. I just didn't like the nausea part, but a small price to pay.”

“I'm not sure why this works faster for some, but after a few days of no BM,  I drank a full 10 oz bottle of mag cit at 5:30 p.m. and nothing happened until 3:50 a.m. (almost 10.5 hours later). No stomach cramping at all and very loose stool, but only once. Made me feel so much better! I will keep some in stock for the future!”

“I was supposed to take Magnesium Citrate for a colonoscopy prep.  It basically just came out like water with not much stool removal.  The next day I drank some fluids and ate a little bit of food because the colonoscopy was luckily cancelled.  I say that because the next day, I was light-headed, off balance, foggy, had a nasty headache, then my kidneys started to hurt.  That's when I went to the doctor.  Test results show that I had low sodium (electrolytes).  Apparently that is a rare reaction to Magnesium Citrate.  So I'm very thankful the colonoscopy was cancelled and I didn't do a 2nd day of prep.”

“After a trip to Urgent Care for pain & pressure, the doctor told me I needed to be cleaned out since she could feel an impaction in my abdomen.  She told me to drink 10 oz the first day & if I didn't get a clear liquid coming out then I should drink half another 5-10 oz the next day. It took about 4 hours to work and then....WOW! I was on the toilet a lot!!! It finally slowed down about 4 hrs later but I still had to go when I woke up the next a.m.  Since I never passed clear water, I took 5 more oz 5 hrs ago and now it has kicked in.  I'll just say the stuff works! I didn't pass a plug like others...mine has been a like a faucet was turned on.  No cramping or bad urgency, but you do have to stay close to home and I highly recommend Baby wipes!!”

“Was constipated 2 days before using. Tried milk of magnesia to no avail. This took me from constipated to diarrhea in a matter of hours and I only drank half a bottle. The taste was quite sour but washed away quickly.”

“I've taken this before surgery and when backed up before.  Right now I'm having increasing lower abdominal pain for a couple days now.  I finally drank 1/2  a bottle about 9pm.  It's 10:42pm and I'm getting some gurgling but nothing more.  I hope this works because I'm in big pain.  I have work at 4am so I'm concerned about my morning experience.  Fingers crossed.”

“I had very hard impacted stools that I tried to expel for several hours. My husband bought magnesium citrate and I drank the entire 10 oz bottle. Nothing happened - so I got into a warm bath and I finally was able to get rid of it one inch at a time. (sorry to be so disgusting). Well, 6 hours later, the diarrhea started and went on every 2-3 minutes until I went to bed. I got up this morning and felt better, but again, I have diarrhea and it explodes from me. 
So, the only thing this drug did for me was to give me diarrhea so I will never use it again. Hopefully, if I stay away from cheesey food, I won't need anything like this.”

“I have MS and I am also on hydrocodone for pain. I do not have a poop schedule. I’m used to going 4-5 days without a poo. This time it’s been 9 days. Chugged the entire bottle at 7:20pm. It’s now 9:12pm. Nothing. A little rumbly in my tumbly and slight queasiness, but no “hallelujah “ moment of blissful intestinal purging. I hope this works. I’m miserable!!!”

“I went to the ER with severe stomach and chest pain and was told I have a partial blockage and to try MC to help pass it. I have a nerve issue which makes my bowels move very slowly so I get constipated a lot, though this was my first really severe case so I decided to try it. 
I took half the bottle yesterday and nothing happened so I thought it wouldn’t ever work. Took the other half today and it took about 6-7 hours to work but it definitely works, a little too well! Got the blockage out after a lot of time and straining and thought that was it I’m better. 

Nope! I have now been in and out of the bathroom for 5 hours!

I gave it 8 stars because it does work but it says “gentle” and it is anything but gentle!! Send help lol!”

“I used this for  Pre-surgery prep .Took one dose the day before laparoscopy surgery to clean out bowels ... quite unsatisfactory.  I am 5’5”, 125 lbs - not a big eater.  Took 4.5 hrs for 1st movement, 7.5 hrs for 2nd, then slight action through night.  Only after surgery (24 hrs after taking the dose) did it totally and finally work.  Was lucky that I did not have accident during surgery.  Just wanted to share my less than favorable experience.”

“I have a history with hard stools. Every once in a while I won’t have a bowel movement for a couple of days and once I do, it’s very hard to pass. I stumbled across this product and about 30-45 minutes after drinking half the bottle, I felt the rumble of the volcano in my stomach. You’ll know you’re ready to go on the pot when you have to hold in your bowel movement because it feels like you’re going poop water. It’s a relief let me tell you. After your poop you’re likely to have the farts for a few hours and they will most definitely stink. But the product works every time.”

“Started out with a severe UTI, prior to that movements were normal and regular, think I got dehydrated and since I have IBS, doesn’t take a lot to throw off my system.  So for two weeks I was fighting this but once the UTI was resolved I still had this pressure/pain on bladder/pelvic area.  Doctor prescribed otc Magnesium Citrate (1 10oz bottle) along with a small bottle of GatorAid, I am not a fan of GatorAid but she wanted to keep electrolites in balance.  Poured them together and sipped on this for about 3 hours.  It took 8 hrs to kick in but I never experienced any stomach pains, cramps or watery diarrhea, but wow will it clean you out.  Don’t plan on any out of your home activities, you will regret it.  Good luck, good health to all.”

“Getting ready to ditch Linzess’s crazy priced  self! It works but it’s expensive. If your insurance will even cover it....

I have tried it all!!!!
800 mg of  Mg citrate  per day will clean you out per day ! I’ve been searching fo an over the counter solution. Gobbling Exlax works too but just ain’t right!”

“Oh it works and it works well. Took about 3 hours to kick in and now I have the dribbles. It’s like freaking Niagra Falls now! Beginning to wonder if I am going to have to take an Imodium to counteract the MC. I drank the full bottle over the course of an hour and followed it up with some water.”

“Having Opiate induced constipation and on methadone, bowel movements are a commodity and a gift. On my fourth day of no-pooping I began to panicky and read about MC.
Went to the pharmacy picked up the lemon lime flavour brand of Citrodan. 
I actually drank half the bottle on the way home and within 45 minutes I was on the toilet excreting the most foul smelling bowel movement I have ever had.
The next few hours were a bit uncomfortable ; gas, gurgling, running to the toilet and some cramping.
This stuff does what it is supposed to do with fervour and dedication.  Be prepared and stay in.  It's best to do it in the morning so you have all day to expel.  Drink lots of water throughout the day and wash .  It does smell bad coming out.”

“Well I just drank a bottle not due to constipation but due to that sluggish, stomach virus feeling that's been lingering around a week now. It's probably from eating too much greasy foods who knows! When I get this feeling I definitely turn to this for a GOOD CLEANING OUT! I give it a few hours and it works EVERYTIME!!!”

“Well,  was backed up for almost 4 weeks. After 2 weeks went in to ER, got lactulose. No success after being told to eat more fibre too. Went back 4 days later.  I had an x ray that showed a lot of stool. Try some citro-dan. Had little success. Took another the next day. No success. Was getting pretty rough. Went back and told to try restoralax. 3 days and was able to go  a little bit but it would not budge the rest. Went back again. Told to try suppositories. Well been using them every night for 4 nights. Decided to use one tonight also took latulose and fiber tabs and metimusul. Had some BM. Took Citro-Mag after BM and water. 2 hours later I felt al ot come out. Was getting a pale clay look of stool before. Got back to normal color and running. Hope it stays clear.”

“After a week of sharp pain in my right lower abdomen progressively getting worse I ended up in the ER. I thought I had an ovarian cyst. The doctor ordered tests to rule out kidney stones or appendicitis. I was diagnosed with impacted bowel! I had been going regularly so it was a surprise although I do take Norco regularly for back pain. Apparently I had a ball of stool stuck somewhere higher up.
     I was sent home with a bottle of MC and drank half the bottle as recommended with plenty of water around midnight. I didn't sleep well from the pain and had a decent BM at 6 AM. Then nothing and still in pain. 
      It is now 7:30 AM and I decided to drink the other half in hopes that this will pass.”

“I was skeptical at first but I went to sleep at 12 then woke up at 5:50 to take the most massive liquified dump ever. It didn't feel horrible and didn't feel bad. I weighed myself before and after and lost 3 lbs in waste and water. That was the first restroom experience. Apparently it lasts 2 days so hopefully it'll be in time for my testing for the army haha.”
“Didn't have a bowel motion for a week and finally somehow found the will within me to drink this stuff. Was on the pot within half an hour and I have gotta say, I'm a new woman”

“So I've been backed up for a good 2 weeks now,  I finally went to the doctor yesterday after trying home remedies, laxatives from the store, etc my pain had been horrible, I've called out of work the past two days, I can barely move, they did an X-ray and I'm full of gas pockets, not stool or poop just gas. They recommended me 3 bottles of this liquid magnesium citrate, 1 a day for the next 3 days. I did one last night yes I've pooped just watery nothing normal but I'm still in pain, so I sent my mom to the store today for gas x, lemons and charmemile tea, I'm still in pain, so I'm about to drink another bottle of this, can anyone relate? Should I go back to the doctor? Is this stuff gonna help the gas pockets? I just want to be over this”

“I drank a 10oz bottle of lemon flavored at 6pm last night and thru the night my tummy giggled and rumbled. This morning at 6 am I went to the bathroom and at 7 am but that's it. I'm disappointed in this stuff because I still feel bloated ad constipated. Any suggestions on how to help it work?”

“Was prescribed this for an upcoming colonoscopy and had to take two full bottles of it. A day apart. 
It gave me a very bad headache and made me feel bloated . My system is slow anyway which is why I'm getting the procedure .
It definitely works but I didn't get very dramatic results with the first bottle . I don't think I will ever drink anything lemon or lime again for a while !”

“I've been constipated all week and nothing provided any relief. My mom told me about MC. I have the day off so I drunk the entire bottle. Why in the world did I do that *sigh*. An hour after taking it, my stomach  started to rumble like a loud motorcycle and I felt a little moist back there. What happened next was nothing short of a darn exorcism. I felt a little nauseous while on the throne and my legs got numb but I was fearful of leaving my porcelain safety net. 3hrs later , trumpet farts, numb legs, sore buttand tired from a intestinal rollercoaster; I've found relief.”
“This product always works. Only downside is slight memory loss after going to the bathroom because you'll poop your brains out!!!”

“Thank the lord for this stuff! I had an operation that left me severely constipated for a week and was ready to do anything to get relief. I felt very nauseous immediately after drinking, but that got better within an hour or two. There was some mild cramping, but nothing as bad as a few days without a BM! I would highly recommend this, just be sure you clear the rest of your day, as it really cleans you out! The directions said to drink half to the full bottle, and I ended up drinking all 10oz. Worked great, didn't find it to be 'too much' or anything, and I'm a pretty small person.”

“I have used magnesium citrate three times and it works like magic! I have gastro issues that are undiagnosed as of now so needless to say I get very backed up, bloated, and feel pregnant. One bottle of the grape drink and fireworks in the bathroom every time! Each time that I go, I feel relieved and in a much better mood. I believe that my body is responding to getting rid of all of the toxic poo and thanking me for it. Before my stomach is hard and I look pregnant. After it is very squishy and I feel like I lose five or more pounds. It is a miracle drink. Please take this if you have any of these issues. It will save you a trip to the ER. ”

“This stuff is a miracle worker. Had indigestion and was just really backed up for a days and was nauseous so I decided to get this to just clean my system out and boy did it do the job. Literally started working like 30 min after drinking the whole bottle. Drank it at about 10am and now it's almost 1am and I still been running back and forth to the toilet. I feel like I've used the bathroom about 25 times today LOL. I'm feeling refreshed and much better. I feel like I'm never gonna stop pooping. Make sure you're free for the entire day and can be home when you take this stuff”

“I wish very much I could give MC a glowing review like so many other reviewers. Unfortunately I can't, as it's been hit or miss for me. I was given MC several years ago to clear me out before surgery. Back then it worked, actually a little too well. I started going about 20 min after drinking the bottle (10 oz lemon lime flavor, not too bad) and I was still having spells of poop water 48 hrs later. This time is a different story. I'm in the middle of a bout with severe acute constipation and was given MC in the ER after my usual home remedies (Miralax, Senakot S, Fleet enemas) didn't work and I got desperate. It's been 8 hrs. since drinking the MC and nothing has happened except some tummy rumbling. So I'm still desperate :(”

“I was constipated for about two weeks when my doctor recommended I take magnesium citrate. Took it around 5pm didn't start pooping until about 7pm and have literally gone to the bathroom over 13 times! It is now 6:30am and has been 13 hours since I drank MC. I'm STILL having diarrhea....”

“Writing this review from the comfort of my toilet....After spending the last two weeks traveling and eating out more than ever, I was in dire need of a #2. Drank the whole bottle of cherry flavored around 5:30 pm and the urge struck around 9:00 pm....2:31 am and still rollin. Works like a charm, but plan to take this with PLENTY of time before bed. Also *DO NOT* drink it hot...left it in my car while I ran errands....the nausea hits like a ton of bricks within the first sip!”

“Oh my goodness, this works like magic! For two weeks I had been in severe pain in the tummy area. I ended up going to the ER thinking there was something wrong with my gallbladder. Only problem was that I was SOOO backed up. They told me to drink some of this and it would work in an hour or so. Lets just say it was a river haha!! If you plan on taking this, make sure you're by a toilet! Once it starts you won't stop for a bit. Also remember to hydrate before and after. Before going I personally felt a little bloated and uncomfortable. But once it works you'll feel much better!”

“This stuff is amazing. I too have bathroom issues and can go 3 days without going to the bathroom. This time it was a week. I drank it Friday, cleaned me right out and today I'm back to being regular.  I think I lost 5 pounds! I was so surprised I didn't bloat for 2 days after.”

“This stuff will GET YOU OUT of a jam!! Like many other commenters on this site, I write from the porcelain throne, after researching for hours whether or not this stuff is for me.

I drank the entire bottle of Cherry MC. Then I drank a bottle of water (this part was hard, I was pretty nauseated). The water is what works it down!

It took two or three hours to work for me. Since beginning this journey, it's been almost 11 hours and I'm still going strong. Scared to drink more water because THIS GIRL IS ON FIRE. I don't want to keep going but I need to stay hydrated. I feel relief from constipation, only to be met with the burning of liquid fire gushing out of my bum. Worth it.

Baby Wipes, Water and A&D are a must to ride this ride.”

“I've heard this stuff is the Liquid Plumber Of The Butt, but so far I'm unimpressed. I felt mildly backed up and my boyfriend recommended this to clear myself out. I drank a 10oz bottle of the lemon (the taste wasn't bad- I will take this over cough syrup any day) at 10:30pm. 5 hours and 2.5 bottles of water later, I've had a lot of stomach gurgling & bloating and, after straining because of no real urge to go, tiny squirts of liquified poop here and there. Farts thus far have been farts, and I remain skeptical.”

“MC works like magic, I swear! I tried everything to pass the large hard stool. It was so painful that I gave up hope and headed to the ER. My doctor told me to buy a bottle of MC and to only drink half of it and wait for the recommended 6 hours before going for the other half. That's what I did. After about 2 hours of laying down waiting for it to kick in and half way through these comments I decided that maybe I should just finish the bottle. Except the second I stood up to go grab the bottle I got so nauseous followed by an immediate need to use the bathroom. It hurt so bad "pass the plug" but there was no stopping it. Basically the second I sat down was a hold on for dear life moment. Once that was clear the relief was instant.”

“After being backed up for over two weeks, being asked how many months pregnant I was, and several suppositories, I tried MC grape flavor. It tasted AWFUL! Within 15 mins, I finished the bottle and immediately felt nauseous. An hour later I threw up like it wasn't anyone's business! 3 hours into it, I decided to use fleet liquid glycerin which helped my pass the "plug". I then went 3 hours with nothing. For the past 2 hours, I've rushed to the throne and have made it rain! I'm talking massive explosions and I know there's still more. I've probably lost 5lbs thus far, no lie! I highly recommend taking MC on an empty stomach because you will feel nauseous. Stay hydrated & use baby wipes. I longer look 7 months pregnant!! Happy pooping!!  :)”

“Wow! These comments are sooo funny. I am severely constipated few times a month. I can only go a little bit everyday and its rock hard and dry. I drank 1/2 a bottle of the lemon (sour but yummy) and followed with 2 big glasses of water. I feel a little nauseated but nothing too bad. Its 11:15pm so hopefully have some relief before I sleep tonight...or I may wake up a messy situation, lol.”

“Oh my goodness this product is definitely a 10.  I had been stopped up for 7 days and tried 3 suppositories, 2 days of stool softeners and even a Fiber laxative. Nothing worked! So I called my GI doctor this morning at 8:00 and the nurse swore on this stuff. She said take 2 bottles at one time and chug it down. Well I've heard how terrible the taste was so I decided to take one 10 oz bottle at 8:15 this morning.  Oh my goodness by 11:30 this morning my behind was rushing to the toilet and boy did I feel better. Needless to say I spent 45 minutes on the toilet because every time I thought I was good to get up, once I stood up it would hit me again. So I'd have to sit back down for a few more minutes.  I'm raw, but it's worth it!”

“So I was heavily constipated. I had an ultrasound to show my tummy because the bloating was so bad. Well I drunk MC around 10:30pm nothing happened . I went to sleep. Around 5:00am my stomach had a little rumble and then my BM came out like a damn hot fire hydrant. Over and over. This stuff is amazing . However stay hydrated and stay by a bathroom”

“Amazing! It had been a week since I was able to use the bathroom and then I heard about MC. I'd say within 10 minutes I had great relief!! A few times...definitely stay near a bathroom! I drank the whole thing. Felt amazing!”

“I'm 5 days post surgery and pain from gas and constipation was unbearable.  After trying several other remedies without results, I finally I purchased and drank a 300ml bottle of lemon flavoured MC.  Just 4 hours later I finally have relief!  The pressure in my abdomen has subsided and I no longer feel like my stitches are going to rip open.”
“I had an impaction even though I usually have IBS-D. This was Horrible!  Uncontrollable & uncontainable diarrhea now on 3rd day after one single dose in the ER.”

“I get constipated quite often and I have tried everything, nothing but MC works for me, I really dislike the taste so I mix either the lemon or cherry with some diet 7up and it helps a lot, I drink the whole bottle at once.. you will definitely want to stay close to a bathroom!”

“Magnesium Citrate can be used a bowel  prep product if used as directed  by colonoscopy nurse.
In low doses it is a mild laxative. I use it for muscles  and sleep much better at night.”

“I wasn't able to use the bathroom for 3 days. Today I went to the dollar store to buy me some cherry magnesium citrate saline laxative. I drink 6oz of it and 42oz of water and hour later I was able to use the bathroom. 2 hours after that I had diarrhea. Thank God I was able to use the bathroom! No, more constipation.”

“Taking pain meds after having back surgery really stuffed me up for 10 days. After trying stool softeners and miralax I hit the web and found lots of good stuff about Magnesium Citrate. I took it around noon and drank 4 or five big cups of water within a few hours. It tasted kinda bitter, but it didn't make me gag or nauseous. After a few hours I became pretty bloated and it was not comfortable. I was starting to think it wasn't going to work until 3:30 am when I finally emptied out. Great stuff. Feel so much better. Worth a day of cramps.”

“Holy  guacamole   Batman it worked! But boy it was a Journey lol for 4 days I hadn't pooped! I had already taken laxatives, stool softener, a bucket of prunes, fiber pills, other fiber pills and still no poop over the last 4 days! So I called friend that has Gastroparesis and asked her what she takes? She said MC! So here it 7:30 at night and I'm off to the drugstore. I chugged it at 8:43 I immediately wanted to puke after I was done. But I said no to myself I have to keep this down! I managed to get down another bottle of water in addition to the two bottles of water I drank before the MC! So I'm sitting here on the potty reading all the other stories and laughing so hard I shoulda crapped my pants but nope! No poop! An hour later I managed to make it to my bed it's 9:45pm insanely nauseated (I gave up on pushing even though I had the urge to) hoping I can just nap then I won't feel the sickness! Then I get this cold sweat come over me, my hands get all clammy, my head starts hurting, I feel like my heart is about to pop out of my chest, my pulse quickened even worse then it had been, my stomach turns and feel everything come up and I projectile puke like in the exorcist movie and it's going everywhere! It doesn't stop after one puke oh no! We're talking 3 projectile pukes! I can't even move closer to the restroom I just fall to the floor completely weak & out of control all cold and sweaty now just puking and puking! it's everywhere! Then when I stop I immediately feel better as far as the nausea and all those other side effects lol but now I have this huge mess! And still no poop! Plus I'm like great after all that now the MC ain't even gonna work because I puked it all up! Boy was I wrong! Got cleaned up and went to bed! Then about 2:04am I awaken with the urge to fart I run to the potty! And oh ya! It was like I pooped out the titanic or something! Once I was done pooping out the poop the size of a killer whale I wiped washed my hands and was gonna turn off the lights and shut the door then I was like ohhhh boy! I had to run back to the potty lol for an encore performance! 
 I puked it all up lol I thought noway this isn't gonna work now! But it did! Dude I feel like pooped so much my legs hurt from flexing them while trying to push lol my caves n ankles feel like they are about to fall off lol and butt feels raw lol it's now 6:56am and I haven't had to poop again thank goodness. idk where it would come from lol all stool was intact no diarrhea so far!”

“Ive started on wellbutrin, and man, I've been extra extra backed up. This time I hadn't gone in almost a week after trying stool softners, senna, bulk laxitives, I even ate 3 servings of broccoli one night with high hopes. Lol. But I remembered my coworker was extremely constipated while she was on chemo last year, so I asked her what to do, and she said MC. Super cheap, and the cherry flavor, while sour, is actually quite delicious. I had a small solid bowel about 30 minutes after finishing the whole bottle (and then 16oz of water) so I was disappointed, but about 3 hours in, I was singing it's praises. Went to bed with no accidents, and woke up with more liquid stool, but no complaints here. I'll never use anything else again!”

“Well low and behold I took the MC around 11pm it is now 2:30am and I'm on the pot just pooping away :) my stomach still is a bit uncomfortable but I feel better :) I drank about 3/4 of a 10oz bottle! Highly suggest this for anyone who is constipated”

“This stuff works AMAZING! Drink a full bottle (I did the cherry and mixed it with 7up, it wasn't bad) and drink and ton of water. As much water as you can. I also suggest moving around instead of sleeping while you're waiting because movement helps your bowels move faster. This will work for you, just be prepared. Dedicate your whole day to this, you'll need it! Happy pooping y'all!”

“After an alcohol binge that messed up my digestion for days I tried 4 tbsp of milk of magnesium, worked a bit, but after a day I still felt backed up. So I took a 10oz bottle of Magnesium Citrate at 8:30pm. Downed it in about 15 mins. I immediately got nauseous which lasted for about 2 hours. But I kept it down. In my 3rd hour it hit me good, I was in the bathroom about 8-10 times between 11pm-2am. I was able to feel better so I fell asleep. Woke up twice at 6am & 7am to another heavy explosion. When I got up at 10am I felt icky, not sick but my insides were crawling. That lasted for a few hours, but subsided. Now its 7pm and still making me go a bit, causing stomach grumbling and gas. Overall, if you want guaranteed effectiveness try this!”
“This stuff works miracles! Took 10 oz and drunk 8-16oz of water right after and within two hours it worked through.”

“After 9 days and 3 enamas, 2 glycerine suppositories, endless amounts of water, smooth move, copious amounts of stool softeners and rancid apple cider vinegar I finally made the jump and drank half the bottle of cherry. 12 hrs 41 mins later I am in heaven! I couldn't be more thankful for this miracle worker. Overall...the cramping was bearable. If there is a next time I will not wait, I'll go straight for the cherry!”

“Make sure you drink more than 8 ozs of water after taking the whole bottle.  LOTS OF WATER right after taking it..  You will need butt ointment, vinyl gloves, baby wipes, and garbage bags.  I had to take 3 bottles in 24 hrs  for the colonoscopy.  My butt was terribly raw,  I used cold pressed castor oil, but I heard A&D ointment works good and prob won't be as oily..  It took 2 hrs to work with just 8 ozs of water, but would have worked sooner if I had taken 16 ozs of water.  The more water you drink the more it will work.  I bought lemon flavor at Big Lots, but I've heard it comes in grape or cherry.”

“I was plugged up really bad for almost a week and 3 days I was taking exlax doculax and Miralax and I couldn't get anything at so I tried the cherry flavor pretty good actually well I chugged it at 7 stayed up till 1 had a little farting so I said hey I'll go to bed and see what happens in the morning sure enough woke up at 8 and here she came lol and yes it still hurt but I was so glad when I was finally able to pass the plug now it's 8 pm and I'm on my 6th BM.... it's a great product will use it next time them dumb pain pills get to me!”

“I went to the ER last night after a week of little BM. the doctor gives you the 10oz and bottle and told me to drink it when I get home, and stay near the toilet. I got home drank it was about 1130 at night so I stayed up till 1:00, eventually I got tired and went to sleep. I woke up at 6:00 with such urge to go. it's 9:00 am right now and i'm on my 4th BM already. it works good just make sure to stay hydrated.”

“I was backed up for almost a whole week after taking a bunch of different antibiotics and every time I tried to go it wouldn't come out or it would hurt to bad to come out. I tried everything and finally a pharmacist offered magnesium citrate and after about 6 hours I was able to go to the bathroom with ease. I've still been going almost every 4-6 hours for the past 2 days. But I feel much better. I would recommend this to anyone having any troubles. I thought I would still be in pain going but I wasn't.”

“I got a good laugh reading a lot of these comments. So I drank the full 10oz bottle at 430pm. It was hard to finish and probably took and hour and a half to finish the terrible thing (lemon flavor) then as prescribed I took miralax right after. Hours go by and nothing is happening. At one point before I go to sleep a little does come out with what I assume is called "the plug" so I'm like okay, yes, here we go. Finally some relief to this stomach pain I've been having for almost two weeks (which was chalked up to stress; causing my constipation). Nope. Eventually I couldn't stay awake but I woke up about every hour throughout the night to go and push just the tiniest amount. Now I'm off to work and still not empty :(”

“I had surgery 6 days ago and was given percadet then I took motrin and tylenol for the pain which caused constipation. I had no bowel movements  for 5 days I tried prune juice, lots of water, walking and Zantac 150mg and on the 6th day my doctor recommended the magnesium citrate. I tried the cherry flavor did half at 1pm and very little happened then at 7pm drank the remaining bottle which to me wasn't that bad just sour. At 2am I was in the bathroom passing diarrhea in parts. My stomach has not stopped rumbling the entire time (it's extremely noisy). This is really uncomfortable and I took the day off for this. I recommend this product if you have constipation. I am thankful that it is finally coming down.”

“Was extremely backed up after 3 wks on tramadol followed by 6 weeks of very poor BMs. Read all these reviews, bought 2 bottles mag cit. First one 11 am, nothing.  Second one at 9pm. At 3am passed small amount, but no gurgles. At 11am next day nurse friend suggested enema, WOW did that work fast. For the next 24 hours, cleaned out system, feel amazing today.”
“12 hours and nothing.... I'm getting worried even this won't work.”
“The absolute only thing that works when I am severely constipated. Always makes me nauseous drinking it (cherry is the best tasting in my opinion) but is worth it!”

“I take this occasionally for really bad constipation.  This stuff works when nothing else works!  However -and this is important to note, it's uncomfortable.  As soon as I take it, I feel somewhat nauseous for several hours, and my heart rate spikes to a worrisome level.  You have to relax and force yourself to hydrate even though you won't feel like eating or drinking anything.  Because of the heart rate, it has sometimes given me insomnia too but I don't think it does that to everyone.  It is cheap & effective.  It's fizzy with a strong lemon taste and a weird aftertaste.  I agree w/ others that you should take a day off & be ready to run to the bathroom several times.”

“So my sister told me about MC. So I purchased it at my local Walgreens. I'm a pretty small person and was worried about having the runs so I only drank about a fourth of the bottle. I did lemon which wasn't to bad, just sour. I took it at 1pm. Then at 2, I sipped a little more so I drank half of the bottle by 2:30. In between the dosages, I drank lots of water. By 3pm my stomach started gurgling and I started feeling pressure. I ran to the bathroom. The "plug" or hard part of the stool was still pretty painful to pass but I was prepared for that. What I wasn't prepared for was the burning. My bum burned like the fire of a thousand suns. But it works well and fast. I would do it again for relief.”

“Works like a charm, but keep the tissue handy...no pun intended! I was having severe abdominal cramping & almost went to the ER. The pain would subside, then go away but on Day 10 I couldn't take it anymore even though I was still having BM's. The doc ordered this, along w/ a powder & some meds to help w/ the muscle spasms (sharp, shooting pain from mid gut to my ass). I took them at 3:15 on the dot (all 3 at the same time) & by 3:30-3:35 I had my first poop. It doesn't give you immediate release but after your 3rd or 4th poop the pressure subsides. You may wanna take a sick day after you take this stuff, LOTS of water to prevent dehydration, Netflix subscription & plenty of TP. Happy Pooping Y'all!!!”

“First time contributing to a forum like this, but wanted to make a public service announcment, because others' comments helped me so much, and made me laugh.  I hadn't had a BM in ten days. By day five I was uncomfortable, by day 6 I was worried, and by day 7 I was ready for extreme measures!  I must have spent over $80 on everything from sena, sena with stool softner, miralax, and even ducolax suppository, with very limited success.  I was worried I'd have to go to urgent care because nothing was moving!  Then, as a last resort I picked up this $1.95 bottle from CVS of magnesium citrate, lemon flavor (tasted fine). Drank with two glasses of water - and, 5 hours later, voila!  Recommend cancelling plans for 24 hours after taking. Worked when nothing else would!”

“I just spent about an hour to an hour and a half reading all of these reviews after taking MC. I am now at the next step of sitting on the toilet clutching my Charmin. I am on an antidepressant and it has caused me chronic constipation. Having constipation frequently throughout my life I was used to going a few days without pooping. After 7 days of not going my boyfriend forced me to take this saying that it was the most amazing thing ever and that I would feel like a new person. Needless to say, I sent him a text telling him how much I loved him. When they say don't trust a fart they mean it! I felt a slight farts coming and after clenching a little realized that this was no normal fart...it was a shart. Run if you feel a fart.”

“After a round of antibiotics and eating too much junk food over Christmas, I was constipated for 3-4 days. The "plug" was too big. I couldn't go on my own. I used MC once before - I took the whole bottle then and had the experience everyone here has described. This time, I read the recommended dose is 6 oz. The bottle is 10oz. So I drank about 2/3 of the bottle. Twenty minutes later, I heard some gurgling, but I didn't have any new urge to go. Instead, I took a three hour nap. When I woke up, I had to go. It was still painful to pass the "plug," but not as much as the other days I had tried. Success! And without complete diarrhea. The stool became soft enough to pass it all. 3 hours later I had a second normal BM. Great product!”

“So I was having extreme stomach and abdomen pain and had no idea what was going on, I had a friend bring me to the ER because I was worried it might be my appendix or something. Well turns out it was not. They made me get a CT scan and long behold the doctor says I'm apparently extremely blocked in my colon which is weird because I had just pooped and I actually poop 9/10 times I go to the bathroom anyway they sent me home with a bottle of This stuff and told me to take it the next day so I started drinking it around 11 and only finished about 3/4 of a 10 oz bottle, it was the lemon and it was just too strong for me. Anyway it was nearly 3 I didn't know why it wasn't working at all then I finally drank some water and boom”

“I was constipated for what felt like a whole week. I tried Miralax, enemas, yoga, ileocecal massage...nothing worked! I was in pain. Super bloated. Felt like I'd gained ten pounds. I actually took magnesium chloride, not citrate...and about 2.5 hours later I experienced the glorious poop chute waterfall. So relieving. I'll always keep magnesium on hand from now on.”

“Drink the whole bottle drink a lot of water I drink the lemon had some nausea and my stomach hurt. As soon as I felt like I needed to pass gas my stomach rumble and I had to go. I got up and felt like I needed to push, had to go again, I've been in the restroom for at least an hour  been pooping and it smells awful (all the old poop). I think this is a great,  you will need some ointment for your butt as it gets raw  ”

“I had a csection 6 weeks ago and everything is still trying to go back to normal. Take a day off for this stuff! It worked in about 5 hours for me. Grape is delicious. First came the plug, then muddy water 3 or 4 times, then mushy, sticky yuck. Then muddy water. This stuff is serious! Be sure to drink water as it directs on bottle and you'll need baby wipes and A&D ointment for your butt.”

“I had been constipated for a week.  It hurt so bad and I mean bad. I didn't know what to do so I called my mother who was a nurse and she told me about MC I thank my Mom so much. She only told me to drink half the bottle. I did at about 6:45 pm and by 3:00 am I was on the toilet. It was like constant relief. Once in the bathroom about every hr. But well worth it. If I ever get constipated again this is what I am using.”

“After surgery 6 days ago, I took Percocet and also laid in bed for 3 days without a lot of movement. I believe this is what cause my constipation. I tried ex-lax max strength on day 6 of not going and it only caused pain. My stool seemed to be too big and too hard to pass. I talked to my doctor and was told to try magnesium citrate. The cherry didn't taste bad at all and I was able to drink the entire bottle. 6 hours later and my stool was STILL too hard to pass. I ended up using Fleet Saine enema and that did the trick. 

I believe that this product would work for most people and would certainly use it again, but with the amount of blockage I had -  I needed more help!”

“Taking the CM for a prep 3 days before procedure. Took it per  Dr's. Instructions at 3pm by 6pm I was riding the throne .
